titles.title: A bill to limit the amount of funds authorized to be appropriated for international broadcasting activities for each of the fiscal years 1994 through 1998.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10576)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 8/5/1993--Introduced. Reduces the amounts authorized to be appropriated for international broadcasting activities under the Foreign Relations Authorization Act, Fiscal Years 1994 and 1995 by $26 million in each of FY 1994 through 1998.
